title: Lewis
name: Butt of Lewis Lighthouse
directions: About as far north as you can go on Lewis. About 1 mile from the bus stop at Eoropie.
content: Red brick lighthouse built by David Stevenson in 1862. The lighthouse was automated in 1998. It is in the windiest spot in the United Kingdom, according to the "Guinness Book of Records". The nearby cliff are also worth seeing. From the road up to the lighthouse, the ground can be seen to have ridges from the old system of "Lazy Beds".
